label: 鎌倉幕府
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: The warrior government, nominally of eastern Japan, that was responsible for policing and providing order, and also adjudicating disputes among jito. One of the most influential kenmon, for it had its own link to the court, the moshitsugi played a crucial role in a crucial role in sanctioning succession from 1221 until 1333.
